promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive legendary chameleon water-type holding a blue crystal staff. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystameleon, a massive legendary chameleon water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: soak, swift. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word chameleon or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, chameleon-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sapphire blue galaxy background
generatedDescription: Crystameleon, a legendary lake-dweller. Forming intricate patterns with its soak and swift abilities, it lives a life of complex colour shifts.
